Package ptolemy.actor.lib.image

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ptolemy.actor.Actor, ptolemy.actor.Executable, ptolemy.actor.FiringsRecordable, Placeable, ptolemy.actor.Initializable, ptolemy.actor.TypedActor, ptolemy.kernel.util.Changeable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Debuggable, ptolemy.kernel.util.DebugListener, ptolemy.kernel.util.Derivable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Instantiable, ptolemy.kernel.util.ModelErrorHandler, ptolemy.kernel.util.MoMLExportable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Moveable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Nameable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageDisplay
public class ImageDisplay
extends Sink
implements Placeable
Display an image on the screen using the ptolemy.media.Picture class. For a sequence of images that are all the same size, this class will continually update the picture with new data. If the size of the input image changes, then a new Picture object is created. This class will only accept an ImageToken on its input.
Since:
Ptolemy II 3.0
Version:
$Id: ImageDisplay.java 57040 2010-01-27 20:52:32Z cxh $
Author:
James Yeh, Edward A. Lee
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • postfire

      public boolean postfire() throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
